price: “Nimuramuka mutamunzaniye nta biribwa muzapimirwa iwanjye, kandi ntimuzanyegere.”
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tatūnī bihi falā kayla lakum ʿindī walā taqrabūni
